concept.shortdesc: A CLI for automating DITA-OT workflows

conbody.p: dita-ot-helper is an open-source tool that automates installing necessary plugins and running DITA-OT transformations using easy-to-understand JSON build config files.

p.note: dita-ot-helper is based on (and therefore requires an installation of) node version 10+. It additionally requires an installed version of Java.
